name: Flags_cloneTest
description: Unit tests for the clone functionality of the Flags class.

test_cases.name: testClone
test_cases.description: Tests the clone functionality of the Flags class, ensuring that the cloned object has the same flags and is equal to the original.

test_cases.name: testCloneWithStateChange
test_cases.description: Tests the clone functionality of the Flags class after turning off some flags, ensuring that the cloned object reflects the state change and is equal to the original.

test_cases.name: testCloneNotSupported
test_cases.description: Tests the scenario where the clone method throws an UnsupportedOperationException, ensuring that the exception is correctly thrown.
